definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: 24But the word of God continued to increase and spread.
sentences.chinese: 神的道日見興旺，越發廣傳。

sentences.english: Once translated into Chinese, the book became very popular among Chinese teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 這本書一翻譯成漢語，就在青少年當中廣傳開來。

sentences.english: When public journalism transpires and proliferates, how do you receive news?
sentences.chinese: 公民新聞顯身廣傳，你如何看待新消息？

sentences.english: But the word of God continued to increase and spread.
sentences.chinese: 神的道日見興旺，越發廣傳。

sentences.english: These insightful suggestions are the key to effective evangelism around the world.
sentences.chinese: 這些明智的建議，正是廣傳福音的關鍵。

sentences.english: They will celebrate your abundant kindness, and rejoice in singing of your justice.
sentences.chinese: 廣傳你無窮慈愛的記念，歡呼歌唱你的公義無限。
